reviewText:
I really like musical especially songs that you hear very often... I decide to give this series a try since only 2 season. I watched season 1 all at once... too bad that NBC cancel after season 2. I wish there is season 3. Fabulous songs and talented actors and singers.
If you like musical and Broadway, you must enjoy watching this.

The DVD's wouldn't play in a regular DVD player. Notice said the DVD couldn't be played in this region. I live in the US. When I put it in a PS4 I could change the region and it would play but you can only change the region so many times.
set came incomplete and had to be returned
This was a gift to my daughter and she loves it.
I wish this never ended! Such great songs and performances and fun storyline. Never a dull moment on the show.  Any Broadway fan will love this!

This was such an awesome show. I wish it has stayed on the air longer.  I love Debra Messing and she was just one of the awesome actors in this show. They were all great! If you love seeing a musical in the comfort of your home, this is a definite purchase.
What I was looking for, for a Christmas gift. I can't find them in a store anymore so it was perfect.

I enjoyed Smash and when I found out my niece loves musicals, I ordered the set for her Christmas present.  In a TV world of shows that are too silly or too mean, this was a good mix of drama, romance, comedy, and music.  I liked the cast a lot, and I downloaded some of the songs.
